ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | bdcdif.1 | |- Bdd_ A |
| 2 |  | bdcdif.2 | |- Bdd_ B |
| 3 | 1 | #P_bdeli | |- Bdd x e. A |
| 4 | 2 | #P_bdeli | |- Bdd x e. B |
| 5 | 4 | #P_ax-bdn | |- Bdd -. x e. B |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_ax-bdan | |- Bdd ( x e. A /\ -. x e. B ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_bdcab | |- Bdd_ { x | ( x e. A /\ -. x e. B ) } |
| 8 |  | #P_df-dif | |- ( A \ B ) = { x | ( x e. A /\ -. x e. B ) } |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_bdceqir | |- Bdd_ ( A \ B ) |
